short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates your "Steven Kruijswijk Coefficient" for Strava rides and shows it on your Strava ride page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every amateur cyclist pretends to be a professional; We wear the same kit, we buy the same apparel and we ride the same bikes. Now we will not become "Stevie", but we can train like "Stevie".

- Calculates the "Steven Kruijswijk Coefficient" without sending any information to a third party server
- Shows the SKC of a ride on the detail page of a bike ride on the Strava website.
